description.value:
Requirements You haven't used this ability since you last Raged.

You stoke an ally's fury. While you are raging, one willing creature within 30 feet gains the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Rage] action, except it can still use concentrate actions.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Share Rage]
